content: lennon s baby blanket by sarah kathryn young zeldasaidso@gmail com the smiling diamonds lace pattern is from barbara walker s a treasury of knitting patterns finished size approx 24 x 28 inches materials six skeins 1050 yards or 960 meters koigu premium merino kpm in white size 2 5 3 mm 24-inch circular needles or larger length or size needed to obtain gauge gauge 7 stitches per inch if modifying pattern for different yarn/dimensions/gauge this lace pattern requires a multiple of 12 stitches plus 1 instructions cast on 175 stitches and knit six row next row and every wrong side row k3 purl to last three stitches k3 next row k3 work row 2 of chart right to left repeating shaded portion 14 times k3 repeat 20 row of chart 14 times 280 row knitting 3 stitches at the beginning and end of every row for garter-stitch border please note that the garter-stitch border and wrong side row are not charted after working 20 row of chart 14 times knit six row to complete garter-stitch border cast off and block α* ¢ \ ¢ \ ¢ ¢ / ¢ / ¢ / 20 \ ¢ \ ¢ ¢ / ¢ / 18 \ ¢ \ ¢ ¢ / ¢ / 16 \ ¢ ¢ / 14 \ ¢ ¢ / 12 ¢ / ¢ / ¢ α ¢ \ ¢ \ ¢ 10 ¢ / ¢ / \ ¢ \ ¢ 8 ¢ / ¢ / \ ¢ \ ¢ 6 ¢ / \ ¢ 4 ¢ / \ ¢ 2 knit \ ssk slip slip knit / k2tog knit two together ¢ yarn over α slip 1 knit 2 together pass slipped stitch over *row 20 on the last lace pattern repeat ssk not a
